html:
Episode 142 Guest: Raj Dutt

08 Jun 2020 |

In this episode we talk about dashboards and grafana with Raj Dutt

Comments

Please leave a comment, positive, negative or just something weird.

Raj Dutt

Raj Dutt is CEO and Co-Founder at Grafana Labs, the company behind Grafana, the open source analytics and monitoring solution for every database.

Raj was the Founder and CEO of Voxel, a cloud and hosting company which was purchased by Internap in 2012, where he spent 2 years as SVP of Technology.

He likes to fly airplanes, and has recently completed his motor¬glider rating.

Guest Episodes:

  • Episode 142 - Grafana
